data.eml:eml: Morphological and molecular identification of two new Ganoderma species on Casuarinaequisetifolia from China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xing, Jia-Hui, Sun, Yi-Fei, Han, Yu-Li, Cui, Bao-Kai, Dai, Yu-Cheng (2018): Morphological and molecular identification of two new Ganoderma species on Casuarinaequisetifolia from China. MycoKeys 34: 93-108, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.34.22593, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.34.22593
